summary: This Simple Mod simply deploys the Dragonborn new Oceanic Waves along proper places on the Skyrim Coast ...
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=http://www.skyrimgems.com][img]http://i.imgur.com/1wXSO.png[/img][/url][/center]
[size=5][b]This Simple Mod simply deploys the Dragonborn new Oceanic Waves along proper places on the Skyrim Coast ... [/b][/size][b]

[youtube]9sfqjrGl1dk[/youtube]
Video by Hodilton

[size=4][color=#ff0000][i]Requires Dragonborn DLC[/i][/color]

[/size][/b]

After Checking the Whole Nexus I couln't find a mod that added Waves from Solstheim to Skyrim and since it seemed strange that no one yet did , I decided to do ... perhaps I have missed some other mods that already did that , but if there is I didn't find ... so here it is ...

[size=3][b]
All waves are placed with logical sense , you will not find oceanic waves around island with waves coming from inland , you won't find waves among icebergs , they all follow the possible natural impact of the ocean , leaving untouched protected inlands and fjords.[/b][/size]


[size=5][b] There are Two versions

Version 1 Vanilla 512x512 Texture

Version 3 HD 2048x2048 Texture

Version 4 HD 2048x2048 Texture and Water Splash

[/b][/size]

[youtube]skH5RHK85Bw[/youtube]
Video by Brodual

[youtube]FsbiMBUagzk[/youtube]
Video by EGMNOW

[youtube]RWipb6XL7co[/youtube]
Video by Orb29

The following videos are based on older versions ...

[youtube]T6e_W933vpw[/youtube]

Insane0hflex video


Compatibilities:
[b]

Water and other mods

[quote]"If you would like to use Waves and WATER together you can. On the WATER page download the Dragonborn add-on (make sure you have the main WATER file installed too) and use the WATER DB.esp plugin option only. This has no waves so compatibility with Waves will be optimal"[/quote]
By Sparrowprince. Author of Water mod

The same can be said of other mods like Pure waters or else...[/b]
author: Prometheus
